Reason: The configuration option DROP_RESTRICT in the h2 software project is performance-sensitive because changing its value can significantly impact system performance. When set to restrict dropping, the system may experience increased memory consumption and slower execution time due to the additional checks and constraints imposed on dropping operations. On the other hand, when set to not restrict dropping, the system may exhibit faster execution but at the risk of potential data loss or corruption. Therefore, the value of DROP_RESTRICT directly influences system performance and should be carefully considered.
